subject: Television
lead_paragraph: The pre-show hype centered around Brett Favre, but Artie Lange, a comedian from Howard Stern’s Sirius satellite radio show, stole the spotlight on the premiere of “Joe Buck Live.”
snippet: The pre-show hype centered around Brett Favre, but Artie Lange, a comedian from Howard Stern’s Sirius satellite radio show, stole the spotlight on the premiere of “Joe Buck Live.”
